mapper.select: SELECT jc FROM ( SELECT @r AS _id, (SELECT @r := sjid FROM rep_bm WHERE id = _id) AS parent_id, @l := @l + 1 AS lvl FROM (SELECT @r := #{chrId}, @l := 0) vars, rep_bm h WHERE @r <> 0) T1 JOIN rep_bm T2 ON T1._id = T2.id ORDER BY id

SELECT bm.id,bm.jc,bm.bh,
bm2.jc AS sjbmmc,
bm.bmfzr,bm.bmdh, concat(bm.szsf,'-',bm.szcs,'-',bm.szdz) AS szdz, bm.cwzg,gs.jc as ssgsmc FROM rep_bm bm,
rep_bm bm2,
rep_gs gs
AND bm.id = #{bmid}
AND bm.sjid = bm2.id
AND gs.bh = bm.ssgsid
